sentences.en: "I want to send a telegram." — "Fine, to whom?"
A few days earlier he had received a telegram from Lord Lloyd.
sentences.cn: 几天前，他收到劳埃德勋爵发来的一封电报。

sentences.en: A telegram from Uncle Fred arrived.
sentences.cn: 弗雷德舅舅发的一封电报来了。
你转送了他的电报了 吗 ?

sentences.en: He sent her off a telegram announcing his immediate return to Queenstown.
sentences.cn: 他给她发出一份电报,说他立即返回昆斯敦.

sentences.en: He sent his mother a telegram upon his arrival in Beijing.
sentences.cn: 他一抵达北京就给母亲发了电报.

sentences.en: He was asked to send a telegram.
sentences.cn: 他被叫去送一封电报了.
我已经收到了你的电报.

sentences.en: If we reword the telegram we can save one - third of the cost.
sentences.cn: 如果我们改写电报文字,费用能省 三分之一.

sentences.en: Just before I left Singapore, I sent them a telegram.
sentences.cn: 在离开新加坡前我给他们发了一封电报.

sentences.en: The president received a briefing by telegram.
sentences.cn: 总裁收到了一份电报简报。

sentences.en: The President received a briefing by telegram.
sentences.cn: 总统收到用电报发来的一份简报。

sentences.en: The victory inspired him to dispatch a gleeful telegram to Roosevelt.
sentences.cn: 胜利促使他给罗斯福发了封喜报。

sentences.en: They dispatched a telegram to the old man's son.
sentences.cn: 他们给老人的儿子发了一份电报.

sentences.en: Will you hand on this telegram to your friend?
sentences.cn: 你把这份电报转交给你的朋友好 吗 ?

words.tran_cn: 电信的；电报的；电报机的
